HW Sales Nintendo DS 508K PlayStation 2 280K Wii 259K Xbox 360 199K PlayStation Portable 180K [B]Game Boy Advance 148K PlayStation 3 130K[/B] GameCube 22K Xbox n/a

item.title: Thursday megaton - PS3 bombas, again
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

jme_009:

When xbox360 came out I don’t recall very many good games. It’s been a while and only now some good titles have, or are, coming out.

Do great games like Kameo, PDZ, PGR3, and RR6 just whoosh by?
And by the way, 2007 is 360 year. Flavours of the month, with the best coming in November. BELIEVE.

Read full topic

item.title: Thursday megaton - PS3 bombas, again
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Cheesehunk:

God of War 2 is the ultimate game.

<3 love you.

And the PS3 is a nice console IMO, but I don’t take sides here beside the fact i can’t stand the WII. Xbox is gud and PS is gud.

Read full topic

item.title: Thursday megaton - PS3 bombas, again
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:9, topic:82135”][quote author=DeadBird link=topic=120714.msg1187811#msg1187811 date=1177119338]

He’s comparing sales 'cause Xbox fail on everything else

What is it failing at I might ask? It has nice HW sales, dominating the SW chart. chris am cry.

You do realize when PS3 was originally released not many copies were available? Also, I would like a direct link to the original source.

God of War 2 is the ultimate game.

Dear lord. Go into a store, you will see a PS3. protip: NO-ONE WANTS TO BUY A $600 CONSOLE, MUCH LESS A $600 CONSOLE WITH NO GAMES. (this is also March NPD, not launch) GAF\SC is reliable, doubting it would just stick out your Sony apologism.
[/quote]

Apart from the 30 that were available on the 1st day.[/quote]
30? On January 7, 2007, Sony confirmed they met the goal of shipping over 1 million units to North America. You think 800k units (I’m being generous) were shipped within less than a month and a half?

Read full topic
